member.summary: Gets a list of properties change notifications since the last .

member.summary: Gets a list of all of the state change notifications since the last .

member.summary: Asserts that the and have only raised once since their last reset.

member.summary: Clears the current list of changed property notifications.

member.summary: Resets the monitored object by accepting changes and clearing the notification lists.
